title: Northern Nights - Yearly Tracker

details.label: Completed Size
details.info: 7.1 x 7.1 inches or 18.1 x 18.1 cm on 14 count aida

story: The stillness of the mountain's landscape was disturbed only by gentle paws in powdery snow as the little traveler paused its journey to observe the sky's transformation from darkness into a symphony of light.
